function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Widespread experience of Covid-19 as a shock to the system","Impact":"Unpreparedness for future pandemics and infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in early detection systems and rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Advanced medical diagnostic tools and real-time data analysis systems","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, government leaders","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Unprecedented experience posing grave new challenges for cities, nations, and the world","Impact":"Disruption of urban infrastructure and public health systems","Mitigation":"Developing flexible and adaptive urban planning strategies, investing in resilient health infrastructure","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, urban planning and design software, and advanced healthcare facilities","People":"Urban residents, public health officials, city planners","Owner":"City governments, public health authorities, urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Reemergence of diseases through sudden outbreaks","Impact":"Potential for repeated infectious disease crises","Mitigation":"Enhanced surveillance and monitoring systems, investment in public health education and awareness","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, data analytics, health education platforms","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, government leaders","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, education institutions"}]}
